research_interests:
Dr. Blue specializes in plasma cell disorders and evaluation and treatment of patients prior to and after stem cell transplantation. Dr. Blue has a research focus in outcomes research. His interest is to explore and eliminate health disparities as it relates to hematologic malignancies.
